document.docAuthor: Guglielmone, Alberto A., Petney, Trevor N. & Robbins, Richard G.
document.masterDocTitle: Ixodidae (Acari: Ixodoidea): descriptions and redescriptions of all known species from 1758 to December 31, 2019

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Ixodidae (Acari: Ixodoidea): descriptions and redescriptions of all known species from 1758 to December 31, 2019

subSubSection.paragraph:
A Palearctic species, all of whose parasitic stages are usually found on Passeriformes : Turdidae , but this species has also been recorded from other Aves (several orders), with rare records of adult ticks from Carnivora : Felidae and Mustelidae (Guglielmone et al. 2014,
Cull et al. 2018
).
Ixodes frontalis
was listed as a very rare parasite of humans in Guglielmone and Robbins (2018) , but
Cull et al. (2020)
added new records of human parasitism by this tick, and
Kar et al. (2017)
recorded several specimens from humans, although these latter records have been questioned in Guglielmone and Robbins (2018) .

bibRefCitation.author: Arthur, D. R.
bibRefCitation.refString: Arthur, D. R. (1952 a) Ixodes frontalis Panzer, 1795. A review of the species. Parasitology, 42, 151 - 154. https: // doi. org / 10.1017 / S 0031182000084390

subSubSection.paragraph:
F: Panzer (1798) , under the name
Acarus frontalis
, and given its current status in Koch (1844a)

M: Filippova (1977) , Santos Dias (1990) , Siuda (1993) , Hillyard (1996) , Slovák (2010) ,
Bona and Stanko (2013)
,
Heylen et al. (2014)
,
Estrada-Peña et al. (2017)

F: Olenev (1931a) , Schulze (1933c) ,
Pomerantzev et al. (1940)
, Pomerantzev (1950) , Arthur (1952a , 1953d ), Babos (1964) , Nosek and Sixl (1972) , Filippova (1977) , Santos Dias (1990) , Tovornik (1991) , Siuda (1993) , Hillyard (1996) ,
Lundqvist et al. (1998)
, Slovák (2010) ,
Schorn et al. (2011)
,
Heylen et al. (2014)
,
Estrada-Peña et al. (2017)
; see note below

N: Reznik (1961) , Babos (1964) , Nosek and Sixl (1972) , Filippova (1977) , Tovornik (1991) , Manilla and Iori (1993) , Siuda (1993) ,
Lundqvist et al. (1998)
,
Bona and Stanko (2013)
,
Heylen et al. (2014)
, Slovák (2014) ,
Estrada-Peña et al. (2017)

L: Reznik (1961) , Babos (1964) , Nosek and Sixl (1972) , Filippova (1977) ,
Manilla and Iori (1992)
,
Márquez et al. (1992)
, Siuda (1993) ,
Heylen et al. (2014)
, Slovák (2014) ,
Estrada-Peña et al. (2017)

Note:
Neumann (1899)
briefly described the larva and nymph (as well as the female) of
Ixodes frontalis
, but those descriptions are ignored in
Neumann (1911a)
; therefore, it is doubtful that Neumann’s specimens were from
bona fide Ixodes frontalis
, and we have excluded descriptions in
Neumann (1899)
from the above lists. Arthur (1952a) noted that there are morphological differences among the descriptions of the female of
Ixodes frontalis
, while
Heylen et al. (2012)
warn about confusing the nymph of
Ixodes frontalis
with that of
Ixodes ricinus .
Filippova (1977) listed several redescriptions of
Ixodes frontalis
by other authors under the name
Ixodes brunneus
, and there are some uncertain redescriptions under the name
Ixodes frontalis
that are not included in the above lists. Redescriptions un-der the name
Ixodes pari
, a synonym of
Ixodes frontalis
, are also not included in the above lists.
